content:encoded:
Heroku, Mailchimp, the Red Cross, GoDaddy, Acer, Nvidia, Brewdog and more sadly join 400+ others in our ongoing visualisation of data leaks, hacks and breaches (2022-2004)

We’ve added an extra new interactive graphic – Breaches by Data Sensitivity – so you can see what kinds of records have been leaked (passwords, social security numbers, medical data). Made with our tool VizSweet.

We’re now in our seventh year of updates. Let us know if we’ve missed any (but pretty please review the datasheet first).

» Safely check if your details have been compromised in any recent data breaches @ haveibeenpwned.com
